channel.title: Product Hunt 热门
channel.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

item.title: LogoAi - AI powered logo maker and brand automation platform
item.description: LogoAi is an AI powered logo maker and brand automation platform that can help small businesses create professional logos, design matching identities, and automate brand promotion with on-brand social media content.
item.content:encoded: LogoAi is an AI powered logo maker and brand automation platform that can help small businesses create professional logos, design matching identities, and automate brand promotion with on-brand social media content.

item.title: Pains, Gains & Goals - The easiest way to engage in a lesson learned session.
item.description: Pains, Gains & Goals was born out of a need to run simple, lightweight lessons learned sessions for in-person, hybrid, and fully remote teams. Ensuring that all participants' voices are heard and that feedback is safe and anonymous!
item.content:encoded: Pains, Gains & Goals was born out of a need to run simple, lightweight lessons learned sessions for in-person, hybrid, and fully remote teams. Ensuring that all participants' voices are heard and that feedback is safe and anonymous!

item.title: SPOOKY Design System - Free Design System for Halloween
item.description: Forget pumpkin latte 🎃👻 this halloween get a full-blown SPOOKY Design System 🤗 📖 Open Source 🧩 17+ spooky Web Components 🎨 Halloween color system 📄 Bleeding-edge documentation 🌚 Dark mode ONLY 👻 Spooky assistant Make your own!
item.content:encoded: Forget pumpkin latte 🎃👻 this halloween get a full-blown SPOOKY Design System 🤗 📖 Open Source 🧩 17+ spooky Web Components 🎨 Halloween color system 📄 Bleeding-edge documentation 🌚 Dark mode ONLY 👻 Spooky assistant Make your own!

item.title: Sublive - Low-latency jamming over the internet
item.description: A new way of making music by connecting musicians all over the world with a low-latency and high-quality audio network. No special hardware is needed, just a desktop computer with an internet connection.
item.content:encoded: A new way of making music by connecting musicians all over the world with a low-latency and high-quality audio network. No special hardware is needed, just a desktop computer with an internet connection.

item.title: Draw This Book - Learn drawing the same way you learned the alphabet
item.description: The premise of this book is simple: the best way to become better at drawing is to draw, a lot. Through tracing, guides, repetition and incrementally increasing the difficulty, you will begin to learn and remember the basics.
item.content:encoded: The premise of this book is simple: the best way to become better at drawing is to draw, a lot. Through tracing, guides, repetition and incrementally increasing the difficulty, you will begin to learn and remember the basics.

item.title: Katteb - 1-Click copywriting tool powered by AI
item.description: Katteb is a writing partner powered by AI that can help you to write better. compile your thoughts, and go creative!
item.content:encoded: Katteb is a writing partner powered by AI that can help you to write better. compile your thoughts, and go creative!

item.title: hasty.dev - A JS Perfomance Tool
item.description: Every developer has, I have at least, been in the situation, that I needed some quite performant code, but didn't know which piece of code is faster - and how does one even test this? 🤔
item.content:encoded: Every developer has, I have at least, been in the situation, that I needed some quite performant code, but didn't know which piece of code is faster - and how does one even test this? 🤔

item.title: This Shoe does not exist. - AI generated shoe designs
item.description: AI generated shoes - plans for expanding product to generate 3D models and use user input
item.content:encoded: AI generated shoes - plans for expanding product to generate 3D models and use user input

item.title: SocialBoat - Shopify for fitness creators to launch online studios
item.description: SocialBoat is Shopify for fitness creators to launch digital fitness studios. In this space, they can host fitness challenges, live coaching sessions, track goals and build a personal community. We want to help 50M creators monetize their talent & knowledge.
item.content:encoded: SocialBoat is Shopify for fitness creators to launch digital fitness studios. In this space, they can host fitness challenges, live coaching sessions, track goals and build a personal community. We want to help 50M creators monetize their talent & knowledge.

item.title: Color Peeker - Color code in the menu bar
item.description: Color Peeker is a realtime digital color meter that sits quietly in your menu bar. It shows the hex code of the color under your mouse pointer. You can also turn on Copy on Right Click, so that when you right click, the color code is copied immediately.
item.content:encoded: Color Peeker is a realtime digital color meter that sits quietly in your menu bar. It shows the hex code of the color under your mouse pointer. You can also turn on Copy on Right Click, so that when you right click, the color code is copied immediately.

item.title: dzook app 2.0 version - Transform yourself into a character in different art styles!
item.description: dzook converts photos into illustrated portraits and videos into animations in different art styles. For this Halloween, we’ve developed a special lens called Zombify which is also featured on Snapchat. Try our filters and give us your feedback!
item.content:encoded: dzook converts photos into illustrated portraits and videos into animations in different art styles. For this Halloween, we’ve developed a special lens called Zombify which is also featured on Snapchat. Try our filters and give us your feedback!

item.title: Shadow - Minimal podcast app with SharePlay on iOS
item.description: Shadow aims to provide a modern, lightweight and clean user interface with a small set of features (including SharePlay) that allow you to enjoy podcasts without getting in the way.
item.content:encoded: Shadow aims to provide a modern, lightweight and clean user interface with a small set of features (including SharePlay) that allow you to enjoy podcasts without getting in the way.

item.title: EazyLoader - Downloading made easy
item.description: EazyLoader is Flask based web-application built to make downloading easy for you. Download videos and pictures from YouTube and Instagram in the best available quality. In addition to that, you can calculate duration of YouTube Playlist at different speeds.
item.content:encoded: EazyLoader is Flask based web-application built to make downloading easy for you. Download videos and pictures from YouTube and Instagram in the best available quality. In addition to that, you can calculate duration of YouTube Playlist at different speeds.

item.title: Dashana - Visualize your data In less than a minute
item.description: Dashana is incredibly simple tool to visualize realtime data from almost anywhere - IoT, Apps, Services, Sheets. No need for coding or design. Simply push your data and widgets are created instantly. Limited time offer. Register for FREE and get Dashana PRO.
item.content:encoded: Dashana is incredibly simple tool to visualize realtime data from almost anywhere - IoT, Apps, Services, Sheets. No need for coding or design. Simply push your data and widgets are created instantly. Limited time offer. Register for FREE and get Dashana PRO.

item.title: Lykeion - Finance newsletter on macro, crypto, impact and geopolitics
item.description: We're a suite of newsletters that cover the intersection of macro, markets, crypto, sustainability, and geopolitics. We're institutional quality, but we keep it light and digestible. We're objective, non-tribalistic, and try to enjoy ourselves.
item.content:encoded: We're a suite of newsletters that cover the intersection of macro, markets, crypto, sustainability, and geopolitics. We're institutional quality, but we keep it light and digestible. We're objective, non-tribalistic, and try to enjoy ourselves.

item.title: PMInterview - Practice product management interview questions
item.description: 100+ Free PM Interview Questions Get solution of questions asked in Uber, Google, Amazon, Swiggy, Flipkart, CRED etc. product manager interviews
item.content:encoded: 100+ Free PM Interview Questions Get solution of questions asked in Uber, Google, Amazon, Swiggy, Flipkart, CRED etc. product manager interviews

item.title: The Closet by Aww, Rats! - The most stylish room in the Metaverse
item.description: The closet is a dApp where you can dress up the rats from Aww, Rats in a variety of seasonal clothes and accessories. Think Able Sisters Clothing for non-fungible rats.
item.content:encoded: The closet is a dApp where you can dress up the rats from Aww, Rats in a variety of seasonal clothes and accessories. Think Able Sisters Clothing for non-fungible rats.

item.title: Vector Ink - Innovative vector design software online
item.description: Effortlessly design vector graphics with Vector Inks intuitive design tools. Vector Ink makes vector graphic design really easy. Best part! It’s a responsive, cloud based app that you can use anytime, anywhere, and on any device.
item.content:encoded: Effortlessly design vector graphics with Vector Inks intuitive design tools. Vector Ink makes vector graphic design really easy. Best part! It’s a responsive, cloud based app that you can use anytime, anywhere, and on any device.

item.title: Notion Starter Pack - Get started in Notion fast and easy
item.description: Notion is a great tool for many things. Start taking advantage of Notion without effort.
item.content:encoded: Notion is a great tool for many things. Start taking advantage of Notion without effort.

item.title: Kopier - Speed dial for your frequently shared profile links
item.description: Kopier lets you store your frequently shared profile links and access them lightning fast with shortcuts. Add unlimited links with custom keyboard shortcuts 100% free forever.
item.content:encoded: Kopier lets you store your frequently shared profile links and access them lightning fast with shortcuts. Add unlimited links with custom keyboard shortcuts 100% free forever.

item.title: Airgram for Google Meet & Zoom - Reimagine your online meeting experience
item.description: Less distraction, more productivity - 🎃 Live transcription for Google Meet & Zoom 🎃 Speaker detection 🎃 Collaborative notes w/ timestamps 🎃 Video recording (1080p) 🎃 Chrome extension for GMeet 🎃 Google Calendar, Slack integration
item.content:encoded: Less distraction, more productivity - 🎃 Live transcription for Google Meet & Zoom 🎃 Speaker detection 🎃 Collaborative notes w/ timestamps 🎃 Video recording (1080p) 🎃 Chrome extension for GMeet 🎃 Google Calendar, Slack integration

item.title: SendgoMail - Email sending made easy & affordable for free
item.description: Sendgomail is a trusted DIY email marketing tool with various clients when they need to send email campaigns without worrying about installing email software.
item.content:encoded: Sendgomail is a trusted DIY email marketing tool with various clients when they need to send email campaigns without worrying about installing email software.

item.title: Weekrise Beta - A clutter-free weekly task calendar
item.description: A neatly designed weekly task calendar. Works great on both desktop and mobile web devices.
item.content:encoded: A neatly designed weekly task calendar. Works great on both desktop and mobile web devices.

item.title: Zolve - Apply for a US bank account & US credit card from anywhere
item.description: It’s not really time travel, but with Zolve you can apply for a U.S. bank account & U.S. Credit Card even before you set foot in America!
item.content:encoded: It’s not really time travel, but with Zolve you can apply for a U.S. bank account & U.S. Credit Card even before you set foot in America!

item.title: Remote3 - Remote web3 jobs
item.description: Find remote web3 jobs, work on the future of the web from anywhere.
item.content:encoded: Find remote web3 jobs, work on the future of the web from anywhere.

item.title: abrief - Making life easier for video producers
item.description: 🙋🏽‍♀️ Do you find yourself spending hours to discover what kind of video commercial your customer wants? That changes now. 📝 Let your client provide you with a better brief 🎥 Spend time on the tasks that generate value 🚀 Meet client's expectations
item.content:encoded: 🙋🏽‍♀️ Do you find yourself spending hours to discover what kind of video commercial your customer wants? That changes now. 📝 Let your client provide you with a better brief 🎥 Spend time on the tasks that generate value 🚀 Meet client's expectations

item.title: Mother Nature Dying - A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock
item.description: Tune into a once-in-a-species event, Mother Nature dying. Listen to the haunting sounds of our dying planet on our iOS and Android apps. A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock yourself, friends and followers to reconsider our lifestyles.
item.content:encoded: Tune into a once-in-a-species event, Mother Nature dying. Listen to the haunting sounds of our dying planet on our iOS and Android apps. A harrowing Halloween audio experience to spook and shock yourself, friends and followers to reconsider our lifestyles.

item.title: Cleanshot - Generate clean screenshots for any website from its URLs
item.description: Create hassle-free browser mockups for any website with Cleanshot. Just paste the link and download the screenshot.
item.content:encoded: Create hassle-free browser mockups for any website with Cleanshot. Just paste the link and download the screenshot.

item.title: MetaJoke - Meta jokes that went viral on Twitter
item.description: "Joke as a service" product 😂 that delivers jokes related to the re-branding of Facebook to Meta. Have 5 mins time? ⌚ -Visit Metaisajoke.xyz -Scroll through tweets roasting "Meta" -Laugh for 5 mins -Carry on with your lovely day!
item.content:encoded: "Joke as a service" product 😂 that delivers jokes related to the re-branding of Facebook to Meta. Have 5 mins time? ⌚ -Visit Metaisajoke.xyz -Scroll through tweets roasting "Meta" -Laugh for 5 mins -Carry on with your lovely day!

item.title: Ship SaaS - Premium Next.js and Supabase SaaS starter kit
item.description: This starter kit includes all the integrations you need to build a SaaS app fast! You'll have a complete app with landing page, login, registration, and billing functionality ready in under a week. It's the easiest way to get started with Next.js and Supabase.
item.content:encoded: This starter kit includes all the integrations you need to build a SaaS app fast! You'll have a complete app with landing page, login, registration, and billing functionality ready in under a week. It's the easiest way to get started with Next.js and Supabase.

item.title: MeetFox - Turn meetings into deals with a streamlined booking tool
item.description: MeetFox is an all-in-one solution built to grow your business. Manage your personal and team schedule, book more meetings with a landing page designed to convert leads, run in-person and online meetings, and impress clients with a seamless customer experience.
item.content:encoded: MeetFox is an all-in-one solution built to grow your business. Manage your personal and team schedule, book more meetings with a landing page designed to convert leads, run in-person and online meetings, and impress clients with a seamless customer experience.

item.title: VC Watcher - Effortlessly stay in the loop what top VCs are investing in
item.description: A weekly email that summarizes recent investments made by top VCs like Peter Thiel, Naval Ravikant, or Keith Rabois.
item.content:encoded: A weekly email that summarizes recent investments made by top VCs like Peter Thiel, Naval Ravikant, or Keith Rabois.

item.title: PullContacts - Pull contact information in minutes
item.description: Quick and easy email address, phone number and social media link scraper. Search for Emails, Phone Numbers and Social Links within a URL.
item.content:encoded: Quick and easy email address, phone number and social media link scraper. Search for Emails, Phone Numbers and Social Links within a URL.

item.title: Blueprint - Your home for impactful democratic giving
item.description: Blueprint helps donors make effective, year-round investments in Democratic candidates and civic organizations. Users can get quarterly giving recommendations, track contributions and impact, download forms to donate offline, and request custom portfolios.
item.content:encoded: Blueprint helps donors make effective, year-round investments in Democratic candidates and civic organizations. Users can get quarterly giving recommendations, track contributions and impact, download forms to donate offline, and request custom portfolios.

item.title: Connect.Club 2.0 - Social network in the Metaverse for genuine human connection
item.description: Welcome to the Metaverse, a smart place for networking. Virtually meet real people just like at events in real life. Come visit our festival Products of the Future and the Metaverse Gallery. Expect engaging panels on how to design the all-new products.
item.content:encoded: Welcome to the Metaverse, a smart place for networking. Virtually meet real people just like at events in real life. Come visit our festival Products of the Future and the Metaverse Gallery. Expect engaging panels on how to design the all-new products.

item.title: VirtualCoffee by Trivia - Introduce teammates, break the ice, & socialize inside Slack
item.description: Remote work depriving you of your break room banter? Miss the gossip, jokes, and fantasy league strategy discussions? Well, fret not! VirtualCoffee helps you engage beyond your screens, enabling you to connect with your teammates and get to know them better.
item.content:encoded: Remote work depriving you of your break room banter? Miss the gossip, jokes, and fantasy league strategy discussions? Well, fret not! VirtualCoffee helps you engage beyond your screens, enabling you to connect with your teammates and get to know them better.

item.title: IconKitchen - Cook up app icons for any platform
item.description: IconKitchen is a fast new way to quickly design app icons across a variety of platforms, from iOS to Android (adaptive icons) to web (favicons and more) and macOS! Choose some colors, textures, and clipart or your own image and you're done!
item.content:encoded: IconKitchen is a fast new way to quickly design app icons across a variety of platforms, from iOS to Android (adaptive icons) to web (favicons and more) and macOS! Choose some colors, textures, and clipart or your own image and you're done!

item.title: Mainvest - The investment marketplace for small businesses
item.description: Discover passive income investments in real brick and mortar small businesses across America. Join a community of investors accessing 10-25% target returns with as little as $100 and diversify your portfolio with an emerging asset class.
item.content:encoded: Discover passive income investments in real brick and mortar small businesses across America. Join a community of investors accessing 10-25% target returns with as little as $100 and diversify your portfolio with an emerging asset class.

item.title: Facebook Reports by Porter - No-code Facebook pages reports, templates included
item.description: Create Facebook reports on Google Data Studio from any Facebook page: yours or your competitors. For social media and content marketers to help them automate social media audits, social media white-label reports, content, and competitive research.
item.content:encoded: Create Facebook reports on Google Data Studio from any Facebook page: yours or your competitors. For social media and content marketers to help them automate social media audits, social media white-label reports, content, and competitive research.

item.title: Doneit 2.0 - Start accomplishing all of your tasks even quicker
item.description: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because it was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's.
item.content:encoded: Meet Doneit, a feature packed daily planner that focuses on simplicity and organization. With Doneit, you don't need to worry about your tasks lists ever being messy because it was designed to help you better organize all of your daily to-do's.

item.title: Cluey Consumer - Make a greater impact through your everyday purchases
item.description: Cluey is a web platform & Chrome extension that shows the impact the brands you buy have on people 👥, the planet 🌎 and politics 🗳️ and suggests alternatives that are better aligned with your personal values.
item.content:encoded: Cluey is a web platform & Chrome extension that shows the impact the brands you buy have on people 👥, the planet 🌎 and politics 🗳️ and suggests alternatives that are better aligned with your personal values.

item.title: Crowdsourced Technical Docs by Almanac - Let anyone suggest changes to technical & community docs
item.description: While most public docs go stale without constant effort, Almanac lets you crowdsource improvements from your community. Readers can suggest changes on branches, which can be merged in, effectively turning your public pages into "living documentation."
item.content:encoded: While most public docs go stale without constant effort, Almanac lets you crowdsource improvements from your community. Readers can suggest changes on branches, which can be merged in, effectively turning your public pages into "living documentation."

item.title: CloudGraph - The GraphQL API for AWS
item.description: CloudGraph is a free and open-source GraphQL-powered search engine for your AWS infrastructure. CloudGraph makes it easy for cloud engineers to write GraphQL queries in order to solve security, compliance, governance, asset inventory, and cost problems.
item.content:encoded: CloudGraph is a free and open-source GraphQL-powered search engine for your AWS infrastructure. CloudGraph makes it easy for cloud engineers to write GraphQL queries in order to solve security, compliance, governance, asset inventory, and cost problems.

item.title: The Coin Project - Launch your own creator coin and monetize exclusive content
item.description: Launch your creator coin, offer exclusive content, and turn fans into investors. Launch your own creator coin with no technical effort. Make money by selling exclusive content. Watch your coin price appreciate as more fans buy your coin and trade on it.
item.content:encoded: Launch your creator coin, offer exclusive content, and turn fans into investors. Launch your own creator coin with no technical effort. Make money by selling exclusive content. Watch your coin price appreciate as more fans buy your coin and trade on it.

item.title: VideoDuke 2.0 - Download videos from YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and TikTok
item.description: A media downloader that can load videos from almost any streaming service, extract audio, and even save images from Instagram. Compatible with playlists. Can be switched to Advanced Mode, which can browse and list any downloadable resources on a given page.
item.content:encoded: A media downloader that can load videos from almost any streaming service, extract audio, and even save images from Instagram. Compatible with playlists. Can be switched to Advanced Mode, which can browse and list any downloadable resources on a given page.

item.title: Free Design Templates from Zeroqode - 25+ inspirational web design templates in PSD & Sketch
item.description: A free collection of web design templates in PSD & Sketch format. These designs are converted from our top no-code app templates for Bubble.
item.content:encoded: A free collection of web design templates in PSD & Sketch format. These designs are converted from our top no-code app templates for Bubble.

item.title: Galactic Camera - Making video fun with easy personalization & effects
item.description: Galactic Camera makes communication visual and lets you easily customize your video to reflect your personality and mood. ⠀ It’s also metaverse ready—we play nicely with web3. Show off your NFTs, share your ENS domain on screen, and more!
item.content:encoded: Galactic Camera makes communication visual and lets you easily customize your video to reflect your personality and mood. ⠀ It’s also metaverse ready—we play nicely with web3. Show off your NFTs, share your ENS domain on screen, and more!

item.title: Xantos Labs - Active investment platform for anyone in the world
item.description: Xantos Labs is an active investment platform that manages your money so that you don’t have to. Get a managed account and effortlessly invest like the 1% with low-fee & institutional-quality service built with everyday folk in mind.
item.content:encoded: Xantos Labs is an active investment platform that manages your money so that you don’t have to. Get a managed account and effortlessly invest like the 1% with low-fee & institutional-quality service built with everyday folk in mind.

item.title: Scary Senders - Detect spooky spy pixels in your emails
item.description: Tracking pixels and open tracking in your emails are spooky 👻 That’s why we at https://getsendstack.com created a fun and easy-to-use email scanner to let you analyze any of your emails. Just forward them and you'll see the result in a second.
item.content:encoded: Tracking pixels and open tracking in your emails are spooky 👻 That’s why we at https://getsendstack.com created a fun and easy-to-use email scanner to let you analyze any of your emails. Just forward them and you'll see the result in a second.

item.title: Storipress - All-in-one web blogging + publishing platform
item.description: The first low-code CMS that brings content, design & editorial teams together to create professional publications that scale. And with the world's fastest hosting, Storipress scales with you whether you are a solo blogger or the New York Times.
item.content:encoded: The first low-code CMS that brings content, design & editorial teams together to create professional publications that scale. And with the world's fastest hosting, Storipress scales with you whether you are a solo blogger or the New York Times.
